title: Identify Unsafe Excavation Hazard
description: A safety officer on a site walk notices an excavation over 5 feet deep that lacks proper shoring or sloping.

tasks.description: Identify the non-compliant excavation and immediately issue a stop-work order for that area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work in the hazardous area is halted.

tasks.description: Log the hazard in the safety system, citing the specific OSHA violation for excavation safety.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new hazard is logged with the correct regulatory reference.

tasks.description: Assign a corrective action to the site superintendent to install proper shoring before work can resume.
tasks.expected_outcome: A corrective action is assigned to the responsible party.
